entry.title: You can't escape from the sunshine!
entry.summary:
Author: Oizys37

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,345Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 140

Summary: Marinette is done with everything. Lie-la is still lying to everyone, Hawkmoth is still outside somewhere sending Akumas to people who feel emotions and Chat Noir is getting flirtier with every fight and doesn't take anything serious.Luckily she has her friends, who are bellieving her and aiding her against Hawk-bitch.And the new student does seem attractive and ....... wait what?
